name: Coin Competition [TESTING]
description:
Hello all!

With the large revamp in my game and an entirely different MO that I've decided to push due to struggles with the other game I've decided to develop a similar game to almost Flappy Bird.  This game is still in development and testing of course but I wanted to upload all of the work I've done so far!  Feel free to take a look and explore.  It'll be quite simple of course as this is my first game, I've ever done but upcoming changelogs will be listed below as I continue on:

Coin Competition: 

A 2D game where the goal is to catch coins and outrun the enemy throughout! It's a peaceful distraction when you may want to take something off your brain such as anxiety or other stressors in your daily life.  

Credit:  GDQuest for all assets used

support them here! 

(205) GDQuest - YouTub

Future Plans:

Add Coins

Add more movement

Add more levels
